name: Spree Bangalore

reviews.text: Very Nice and friendly staff, quality of room is really good and food is very fresh and lots a variety. Very professional people and they does everything in their limit to satisfy the guest. For a business travellor like me, I am going to come back to this hotel again.
reviews.title: Amazing Service.. very nice and helpful staff

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I stayed at spree banglore with my wife for a period of 30 days. The first thing i noticed about the hotel was the rooms. The rooms are pretty big. All of them. I though stayed in the club room and then later the executive room. The rooms are just the best in this hotel and price category. Also the service is very good. Sandeep, manager@frontdesk, was very coperative and accomodating and shobha was prompt. Shekhar from the housekeeping did an amazing job as well. Personalized service is what u wud get while here. I must also mention the restaurant staff especially the manager mr. Pradeep. They went out of their way to accomodate our requests. The hotel itself is very comfortable and clean with modern looks. The best in its category.
reviews.title: A great place to stay

reviews.text: the hotel is a good choice for a business trip...
reviews.title: nice executive hotel...

reviews.text: it's clean n nicely maintained,the rooms r big n have all basic necessities...
reviews.title: Ideal Place for a long stay

reviews.text: the staff is very courteous..they provided me a early check_in without charging extra for it....
reviews.title: Great Service

reviews.text: As a Westerner, I struggle with this review.
reviews.title: Great service, fantastic value

reviews.text: The staff is great, always a warm greeting and always responsive when there is a need. The location is just minutes away, either driving or walking, from a number of office buildings. My low rate included the room, breakfast, and free wifi. The restaurant and lounge on the top floor both provide excellent evening stops without having to leave the building.
reviews.title: Pretty Ordinary

reviews.text: Along with that low, budget rate comes the cleanliness of a low, budget hotel. The bed sheets and towels were very clean. However, the vertical surfaces of the walls, doors, etc. were deeply stained and smudged, lacking a good, frequent scrubbing with a soapy rag. The grout in the bathroom needed thorough scrubbing, as well. In general, the property needed a maintenance crew with a critical eye to restore and keep the property in the condition it was first built.
reviews.title: Good Hotel Nice Comfortable Stay

reviews.text: I have stayed in this hotel twice for 1 night each. Experience was pretty ordinary.
reviews.title: Good business hotel

reviews.text: You have to shout at the staff at times so that they understand.

reviews.text: It's just an economy class hotel in budget but I would rank it the best I visited in that budget range... So enjoy the stay and don't miss the veg biriyani it's best in class
reviews.title: Value for money

reviews.text: Overall it was a pleasant stay at Spree nice room good space good music pubs bar etc...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Booked through Travel Guru for 2 nights ,Got the best deal, later on Extended as on personal,,,,,,About the Spree....Very Nice Hotel,Professional Staff, Smiling People at Front Desk (SHoba), Food at Feast, every thing was excellent,...Attention of Sandeep/manju at Desk, eg Room was Shifted from Ground floor to 3rd floor at one request, and on other requests aswell.
reviews.title: Nice location, luxurious rooms at considerably low prices.

reviews.text: i works for Ericsson which is near to Spree and even though my office transfer was not included but they gave me..Also would like to mention for room cleaning boy he has done excellent job.....thanks for every thing...and will be happy if you give me room with balcony always.......
reviews.title: Weekend Stay

reviews.text: At Spree I stayed in a club room and I cannot remember any other hotel which offers such spacious, luxurious rooms at such low prices.
reviews.title: GREAT PLACE FOR WEEKEND

reviews.text: Right the moment entering the Spree hotel in Bangalore, I felt very warm welcome. The hotel is clean, quiet, and the facilities are very good. There are many dishes on breakfast. But the most impressive at all is the staffs, like the Spree's slogan: "Do More". They enthusiastically and please help/clarify on any concerns I've had. Definitely I'll choose this hotel on my next business trip to Bangalore.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel to stay in Bangalore

reviews.text: The hotel is conveniently located on the outer ring road, with easy connectivity to city and airport. There is a bus stop within 100 mts of the hotel entry.
reviews.title: Good value for money

reviews.text: Check-in is very smooth and fast, and there will be someone to escort you to your room. The lobby is clean and well maintained.
reviews.title: New place in bangalore

reviews.text: Rooms are spacious, but the wardrobe and the bathroom are delight. Very spacious and well designed wardrobe and equally big bathroom with a separate bath tub and glass cabin for shower.
reviews.title: Nice place Value for Money

reviews.text: However the water outlet from the shower is not very impressive and is not convenient to bath. There was no warm water in the morning, so using the bath tub was out of question.
reviews.title: Value for Money

description: Spree Bangalore is the flagship hotel of the Spree Group of Hotels. Located in the heart of India’s largest IT Corridor – the Outer Ring Road (Marathalli – KR Puram Stretch), with close access to Sarjapur, Whitefield, and en-route to Electronic City – the Spree is ideally located for the modern business traveler. With us, you not only stay, you Spree! We offer all the benefits associated with a business hotel, and so much more: 100% Free Wi-fi, no strings attached, Complimentary Hot Breakfast, 24x7 Business Center with the ability to print from your room, Nirvaana Spa, with aromatherapy treatments, open late, Hotel-Operated Limousine Service from the Airport at reasonable rates, Full-fledged Concierge and Secretarial services to help you make the most of your limited time with us! A Rocking Pub, A Skybar with a View, and a Multi-Cuisine Restaurant to satisfy your hunger pangs 24x7, Plush Bedding, All-natural bath amenities, Power Shower, with glass cubicles. Most importantly, our Spree service is something you will rave about to your friends. So, if you are looking for something to show off to your friends about from your Bangalore visit, come stay at the Spree Bangalore!
